title: Building a Community of Trust in a Rowing Team
description:
This video is on the book "Boys in the Boat" by Daniel James Brown. I thought this story portrayed, more than anything, the value and necessity that we are involved in a community of trust. 

Link to the book: https://www.amazon.com/Boys-Boat-Americans-Berlin-Olympics/dp/0143125478/ref=sr_1_1?crid=3ECCI6530OQIL&keywords=the+boys+in+the+boat&qid=1642090295&sprefix=the+boys+in+%2Caps%2C214&sr=8-1

My Writing: https://coltonkirby.substack.com/

There is an audio version of my videos (on all podcast platforms): https://anchor.fm/coltonkirby

About Me: https://coltonkirby.substack.com/about?utm_source=menu-dropdown
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/coltonjkirby/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/_coltonkirby
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/officialcoltonkirby/
Odysee: https://odysee.com/@ColtonKirby
